settings.label: Collection
settings.default: Shop %% current_tags || join: ', ' || append_not_empty: ' ' %%%% collection.title || escape %% at %% shop.name %%

settings.label: Catalog Page
settings.default: Browse %% collection.products || map: 'collections' || map: 'title' || uniq || take: '5' || join: ', ' || escape || remove: 'Home page, ' || remove: 'home page, '  || remove: 'Home page' || remove: 'Home page'  %% at %% shop.name %%

settings.label: Blog
settings.default: %% shop.name %% %% blog.title %%%% blog.all_tags || take: '5' || join: ', ' || prepend_not_empty: ' blog: ' || append_not_empty: ' and more' %%

settings.label: Page
settings.default: %% page.content || strip_newlines || strip_html || escape || append_not_empty: '.' %% Visit %% shop.name %%

settings.label: Search
settings.default: Find %% search.terms || default: 'it' %% here%% search.results || map: 'title' || take: '3' || join: ', ' || prepend_not_empty: ' including ' || append_not_empty: ' and more' %% at %% shop.name %%

settings.label: Collection
settings.default: %% collection.all_tags || take: '3' || join: ', ' || prepend_not_empty: 'Shop ' || append_not_empty: ' and more ' %%%% collection.title || escape %% at %% shop.name %% %% collection.description || strip_html || strip_newlines || escape || strip %%

settings.label: Catalog Page
settings.default: Discover %% collection.products || map: 'title' || uniq || take: '3' || join: ', ' || escape %% and more.

settings.label: Blog
settings.default: %% blog.articles || map: 'title' || take: '3' || join: ', ' || prepend_not_empty: 'Read about ' || append_not_empty: ' and more on the '%%%% shop.name %% %% blog.title %% blog.

settings.label: Article
settings.default: %% article.excerpt_or_content || strip_newlines || strip_html || escape %%%% article.tags || take: '6' || join: ', ' || prepend_not_empty: ' Read about ' || append_not_empty: ' and more' %% %% article.title %% on the %% shop.name %% %% blog.title %% blog

Default Banner Image for all Collections
settings.info: To apply the default banner to a collection, please set its metafield Namespace: 'global', Key: 'uses_default_benner', to Value Type 'String' and Value '1'.  To do this, click 'More actions' under the collection title, in the Shopify collection edit UI, and select 'Edit Metafield'.  Also, IMPORTANT - Please make sure to click 'Edit' and set the 'Image Alt', which should be the text a blind or sight imapired person would need to read to understand what the image is about.

settings.label: Number of new products to show
Allow shopper to see prices in his own currency?

settings.content: Separate your currency codes with a space. Use the ISO 4217 3-letter currency code. Click [here](http://www.xe.com/iso4217.php) for a complete list of currency codes. Example: CAD USD.

* For this functionality to work in your shop, you are required to edit your money formats as per [these instructions](http://wiki.shopify.com/How_to_Show_Multiple_Currencies#Do_tell_where_the_money_is) (Do tell where the money is).

settings.label: Warranty Program Name
settings.info: The name for the warranty program.

settings.label: Warranty Eligible Brands
settings.info: Brands whose products are  eligible for warranty, unless they contain the Warranty Ineligibile Tag.

settings.label: Warranty Eligible Brands
settings.default: Optional Protection Plan Available with Piece Protect.
settings.info: Default text to show if no warranty metafield text.

settings.label: Warranty Ineligible Product Types
settings.info: Product types that are ineligible for warranty.

settings.label: Warranty Ineligible Tag
settings.info: Tag used to designate products that are not eligible for warranty, even if their brands are.

settings.label: Warranty Page Handle
settings.info: The page explaining the Warranty Program.

settings.label: Warranty Product
settings.info: The product that will be added to cart on warranty program opt-in.

settings.label: Warranty Collection
settings.info: The collection that will hold all the warranty eleigible products that the discount code can be used on.

settings.label: Warranty Percentage
settings.info: Percent of product price that will determine the pirce of warranty. 1-100.

settings.label: Show Warranty Percentage on Cart
settings.info: Show the Warranty Program percentage price (eg. '9%')
WARNING: Make sure you know waht you're doing!

settings.label: Enable Warranty Plan in "Product Details"
settings.info: Enable Warranty Plan in the "Product Details" section of eligible products, allowing a customer to purchase a redeemable warranty plan for their purchased product. ("Enable Warranty Upsell Popup Modal" can be added later, along with other possible displays.

settings.label: Display Free Gift progress?
settings.info: If checked, Free Gift progress will be shown on each product item in collections, carousels, and cart.

settings.label: Display Free Gift Tiers at top of cart?
settings.info: If checked, Free Gift tiers suggestions display will be shown at the top of the cart.

settings.label: Tag Start
settings.info: Start of tag indicating Free Gift cart amount. Example: "free gift at " if the whole tag is something like "free gift at $100"

Answer for Question 1
settings.default: You can spend your points by logging into your customer account and then clicking on the launcher. Under the 'Rewards' section, you can click 'Redeem' next to the reward that you want to claim!

settings.label: Question 2
settings.default: How much does it cost to join?

settings.label: Answer for Question 2
settings.default: Our rewards program is totally free! We do it to say 'thank you' to our awesome customers!

settings.label: Question 3
settings.default: Is there a limit to how many order points I can get?

settings.label: Answer for Question 3
settings.default: There is no limit! Collect as many points as you please.

settings.label: Widget loading text:
settings.info: Text to display while widget is loading

settings.label: Copy the classes from the add-to-cart button for the 'Complete Subscription' button?
settings.info: If checked, Recurring Orders will attempt to automatically match the style of our 'Complete Subscription' button with your theme's 'Add-to-cart' button. The 'Complete Subscription' button is used when Recurring Orders is in Single-Product mode and for subscriptions that have a 'Prepaid' option.

settings.label: Hide BOLD RO Prepaid Option?
settings.info: If checked, the 'Prepaid' option checkbox will be hidden.  Used when its malfunctioning

settings.label: Additional classes for the 'Complete Subscription' button
settings.info: Enter any additional class names that you would like to use to style the 'Complete Subscription' button.

settings.label: Enable Hiding Shipping Methods by Customer Tag
Wholesale Customer Tag
settings.info: Tag to designate wholesale clients (no free shipping)

settings.label: Enterprise Customer Tag
settings.info: Tag to designate enterprise clients (no overnight shipping)

settings.label: Anchors Selector
settings.info: A jQuery CSS-style selector for foanchorsrms which to process. Eg, a

settings.label: Forms Selector
settings.info: A jQuery CSS-style selector for forms which to process. Eg, form[action='/search']

settings.label: Excluded Class Names
settings.info: A comma (and space, for readability) separated list of excluded class names. Eg, btn-checkout, ajax-disable, ajax-disabled

settings.label: Excluded Href Paths
settings.info: A comma (and space, for readability) separated list of excluded URL paths. Eg, /cart/change, /checkout

settings.label: Enable URL Cache
settings.info: This option makes SN store previously visited URLs content in cache, for quicker loading on re-visit.

settings.label: Cache Max Items
settings.info: Max href items to hold in urlCache.

settings.label: Time to Cache Expiration
settings.info: The time until a cache/urlCache entry expires and must be re-downloaded (in ms).  Takes either an integer time (eg, 86400), or an simple equation (eg, 24 * 60 * 60).

settings.label: Enable Prefetch
settings.info: This option makes SN prefetch URLs hovered by the mouse cursor, or touched on scroll on mobile touch devices, and stores it in cache for faster visits. NOTE: URL Cache must be enabled for this to work.

settings.label: Prefetch Rate Limiter
settings.info: The time to wait between prefetches.  This helps to not break Shopify.

settings.label: Prefetch Delay
settings.info: The time to delay prefetch processing, to prevent 'click hijacking,' where the hover or touchstart action stops propagation to actual clicks, and makes clicking links feel buggy.  A good value seems to be about 10-20ms.  37ms by default, for safety.

settings.label: Debug Mode
settings.info: SN will output debugging messages to the browsers web-dev console using.
